tool_description: Analyzes review authenticity using linguistic patterns, review characteristics, and behavioral indicators to detect potentially fake reviews.

review_text.description: Review text to analyze for authenticity

review_length.description: Length of review text in characters

time_since_purchase.description: Days between purchase and review posting

verified_purchase.description: Whether the review is from a verified purchase

linguistic_analysis.description: Whether to perform deep linguistic pattern analysis

check_emotion_authenticity.description: Whether to analyze emotional authenticity in the review

compare_rating_text_alignment.description: Whether to check alignment between rating and review text sentiment

template_detection.description: Whether to check for template-generated content

statistical_outlier_detection.description: Whether to detect statistical anomalies in review patterns

error_messages: Empty review text: Review text cannot be empty for authenticity analysis
Invalid rating score: Rating must be between 1 and 5
Invalid review length: Review length must be non-negative
Invalid profile completeness: Reviewer profile completeness must be between 0 and 1
Invalid time since purchase: If provided, must be non-negative integer
Analysis configuration error: At least one analysis method must be enabled
usage: Provide review text, rating, and reviewer information. Enable various analysis options to customize fake review detection sensitivity and methods.

authenticity_score.description: Probability that the review is authentic (0-1)

fake_indicators.description: List of indicators suggesting the review may be fake

authenticity_level.description: Overall authenticity assessment: authentic, suspicious, likely_fake
